name: Zilean
title: the Chronokeeper
shortBio: Once a powerful Icathian mage, Zilean became obsessed with the passage of time after witnessing his homeland's destruction by the Void. Unable to spare even a minute to grieve the catastrophic loss, he called upon ancient temporal magic to divine all possible outcomes. Having become functionally immortal, Zilean now drifts through the past, present, and future, bending and warping the flow of time around him, always searching for that elusive moment that will turn back the clock and undo Icathia's destruction.

skins.name: Old Saint Zilean
skins.description: Though many Santas compete to give the most holiday cheer, Zilean's mastery over the flow of time lets him deliver huge numbers of presents in an instant. So far this has not created a reality-annihilating Snowdown paradox.

skins.name: Groovy Zilean
skins.description: Consistently in a near-comatose state from peering across the space-time continuum, Zilean's more recent hobbies include being terrible at hacky-sack, paying way too much for a ticket for awful music festivals, and ordering too many pizzas. He also owns New Age bookstore, which is closed most days.

skins.name: Blood Moon Zilean
skins.description: Manipulating the lunar cycle by fueling his temporal magic with human blood, Zilean is the face of the Blood Moon cult, and a hellish warlock of unimaginable power. His mind exists across the flow of time, communing with legions of demons from the past, present, and future.

skins.name: Sugar Rush Zilean

chromas.name: Sugar Rush Zilean (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2019.

chromas.name: Sugar Rush Zilean (Sweet Tooth)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in 2019.

skins.description: For most denizens of Candy Kingdom, there's never enough time to eat all the sweets. For Zilean, there's never enough candy to fill all the time.

skins.name: Winterblessed Zilean

chromas.name: Winterblessed Zilean (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.name: Winterblessed Zilean (Wreathguard)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Season 2023 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Season 2023 event.

skins.description: Sage Zilean bowed his head in supplication as he took the Hunter's place before the Aurora's judge. His request was for more power to help calm the spirits of his followers. As he talked, he was oblivious to the Aurora sheen of Polaris' hair flickering red as she watched his pronounced humility. Something was stirring inside her, a roiling winter storm.

skins.name: Arcana Zilean

chromas.name: Arcana Zilean (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: The High Clocktower looms above the Upper city, nearly scraping the steeple of its twin in the Lower world. Within, intricate mechanisms—delicate golden stars, a copper sun, miniature people in a miniature world—trace the vicissitudes of fate under the watchful eye of Zilean. From here he sees the whole Pattern, maintaining careful equilibrium.

passive.name: Time In A Bottle
passive.description: Zilean stores time as Experience and can grant it to his allies. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level up, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives.

spells.name: Time Bomb
spells.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb that sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it. After @Effect2Amount@ seconds it detonates, dealing @TotalDamage@ magic damage.

Placing a second bomb on a unit that already has one detonates the first bomb immediately and Stuns enemies in the blast for @Effect4Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Rewind
spells.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
spells.dynamicDescription: Zilean turns time, reducing his other basic Ability Cooldowns by @Effect2Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Time Warp
spells.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Move Speed or increasing an ally's Move Speed for a short time.
spells.dynamicDescription: Zilean <status>Slows</status> an enemy champion by @Effect2Amount@% or grants an allied champion <speed>@Effect2Amount@% Move Speed</speed> for @Effect1Amount@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Chronoshift
spells.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
spells.dynamicDescription: Zilean grants a protective time rune to an allied champion for @RDuration@ seconds. If the target would die, the rune rewinds their timeline, putting them into Stasis for @ReviveStateDuration@ seconds, then reviving them and restoring <healing>@RTotalHeal@ Health</healing>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
